column4: im haing alot of problems with amarok, when I load it and tell it where my music is it will sit for over an hour 'processing' and never finish i have about 20GB of mp3's on a UltraATA Seagate, P4 2.53 and 512MB Pc1066, the machine doesnt really seem like its stressing out evreything else works fine but I can never get the play list to populate
if i try to play a particular mp3 direcly it just sais "populating playlist" and crashes
im running a fresh install of fiesty
Hrm, I have about 40GB, and it took only a few minutes to populate the playlist.
